Class ComputerStore

java.lang.Object
  ComputerStore

public class ComputerStore
extends java.lang.Object

A class ComputerStore to represent a store that stores a list of computers,and methods to add or remove computers, to print all the computers , to get the total cost, and to get the most expensive computer.

Version:
(2017-01-28)
Author:
(Lana Barikhan)
